name: RICE (Gamesruleyears)
description:
RICE, or Racing: I can't explain, is a small racing game built in under 48 hours for GMTK 2022 game jam. After the jam is over I plan to update it a few more times.

This is the jam build! The first version of the game.

Currently the game includes: 2 tracks, broken AI, and some fun driving.
